name: AfroDucklings
description:
Afro-Arcade presents Afroducklings! Inspired by Lemmings, and conceived for CurdleJam#22 themed: "Chain of Events".

Help your freshly hatched ducklings reach the local cafe for a much needed cup of tea! Assign roles in the correct chain of events to make it through without any ducklings getting hurt.

Supports both mouse and touch (including hopefully mobile browsers)
